description: Colby Jansen has his eyes set on Tommy Regan. The Patriot Act is going to help him get Tommy’s ass—listening in on him via the ear piece he planted on Tommy’s back, he realizes he has a boyfriend: Wesley Woods. Tommy and Wesley get down to business, beginning with a blow and a rim before Wesley enjoys pillaging Tommy’s tight hole—all while Colby listens in.
title: Spymaster Part 1
